metadata.title: CVE-2024-26680 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:atlantic: Fix DMA mapping for PTP hwts ring Functionaq_ring_hwts_rx_alloc() maps extra AQ_CFG_RXDS_DEF bytes for PTP HWTS ringbut then generic aq_ring_free() does not take this into account. Create anduse a specific function to free HWTS ring to fix this issue.
